name: union denim stripe {bow tie}
description:
pattern: stripes
fabric: 100% cotton 
style: thistle

FORAGE bow ties are hand crafted in limited numbers using new, vintage and deadstock fabrics. our bow ties must be hand tied but don't worry, practice makes perfect. they're adjustable in length, fitting neck sizes 14-18. each bow tie is packaged in a vintage style gift box with metal tabs and coordinating swatch.

to care for your bow tie: iron with steam to keep it crisp and dry clean to keep it fresh.

categories.name: U N I O N collection

FORAGE bow ties are hand crafted in limited numbers using new, vintage and deadstock fabrics. our bow ties must be hand tied but don't worry, practice makes perfect. they're adjustable in length, fitting neck sizes 14-18. each bow tie is packaged in a vintage style gift box with metal tabs and coordinating swatch.

name: union denim stripe {necktie}
description:
pattern: stripe
fabric: 100% cotton
style: 2" and 2.5" necktie 

FORAGE neckties are hand crafted in limited numbers using new, vintage and deadstock fabrics. our union neckties measure 58" in length and are available in both 2" and 2.5" width. sewn inside each necktie is a secret message inspired by sayings found in an early 1900's autograph book. each necktie is packaged in a vintage style gift box with metal tabs and coordinating swatch.

to care for your necktie: iron with steam to keep it crisp and dry clean to keep it fresh.

FORAGE neckties are hand crafted in limited numbers using new, vintage and deadstock fabrics. our union neckties measure 58" in length and are available in both 2" and 2.5" width. sewn inside each necktie is a secret message inspired by sayings found in an early 1900's autograph book. each necktie is packaged in a vintage style gift box with metal tabs and coordinating swatch.

to care for your necktie: iron with steam to keep it crisp and dry clean to keep it fresh.
